name: Taxi Driver 3D Simulator - Supermarket Parking
description:
Here’s a chance to drive your own medallion taxicab in new york city. Pick n drop people at supermarket to earn taxi fares. Drive thru rushy city in crazy traffic without wrecking cars and become an ultimate taxi driver. Get your driving licence from parking school and start your crazy adventure in midtown rush.

Drive thru supermarket for transporting citizens who want to do grocery shopping. Drive taxi service around suburban town to pick up passengers and earn cab fares. Real taxi driver knows that time is money so hurry up and transport as much passengers as you can. Remember traffic rule violation can cause troubles like wrecking cars and suspending driving license. If you’re crazy about car parking games then Supermarket Taxi Driver 3D simulator game is best for you. Drive cab in rush hours when city traffic is crazy. Get behind steering wheel of your favorite car taxi, fasten seat belt and drive super fast thru busy streets. People need groceries from local super store, pick them from house and drop at city supermarket. Enjoy role of valet car parking job outside departmental store and drive luxury cars. Drive yellow cab in new york city to transport people within modern city. Drive with extreme car and don’t act like a crazy taxi driver smashing cars and trucks. Reckless driving like school bus driver or a heavy duty trucker. Taxi driver job is hard for newbie drivers but most challenging for pro. Enjoy the latest taxi simulator game of 2016 in amazing yellow cabs.

Get convertible taxi like BMW Z4 and bugatti veyron. Perhaps a luxury sports car like lamborghini or VIP limousine would be nice to drive on asphalt roads. Become the world’s best taxi driver be it new york, london or paris.

Key Features of Supermarket Taxi Driver 3D Simulator Game:
Crazy taxi driving missions in multiple cars
Intense speed driving levels with futuristic vehicles
Customizable controls and realistic car physics
Detailed city map with infinite routes to destinations
Amazing 3D graphics, real car engine sounds
Biggest city environment with AI traffic
